transcript:
Customer: Hello?
Executive: Hello. Hello? Hello, haan ji, main sir Ranjan baat kar rahe hain SK Trading se?
Customer: Haan, kar rahe hain.
Executive: Sir, very good afternoon. Main Reshu baat kar rahi hoon. Your relationship manager from IndiaMART Noida office. Sir, actually aapka ek customer care mein call aaya tha hamare.
Customer: Ji, ji.
Executive: Ji, uski call kya hai? Kahan pe issue aa raha hai? Kya problem face kar rahe hain sir, kya hai?
Customer: Main bata raha hoon, mera jo number add hai, mera do number add hai, teen number add.
Executive: Ji. Ji.
Customer: Har number pe thoda sa mere ko nahi aa raha hai ye. Jo third number add hai, 96 number hai na.
Executive: Okay. 90907 aap thoda dekh lijiyega IndiaMART khol ke.
Executive: Just a one minute, sir.
Executive: Sir, in account there is a two number registered. Primary or secondary. What preferred service number? What preferred service number? There is a three number added. From where you can get the customer calls, right sir?
Customer: Achcha.
Customer: Main teen number add teen number jo add hai na, usko main lena chahta hoon. Har number mein add karna chahta hoon. Main add to kar diya apne aap mein, magar wo bylead nahi aa rahi hai. Agar aisa nahi hai to mera ek number kaat dijiye, wo number add kar dijiye. Main wahi jaanna chahta hoon.
Executive: Sir, dekhiye, hum aapko jo bylead access hoga na ya app access hoga, wo primary number ke through hi hoga. Primary number aapka 94 se jo starting digit hai aur last mein 781 hai, that is your primary number, right sir? Usi se login hoga. If any other person want to login na, to aapko OTP ke through through wo login kar sakte hain desktop pe ya fir IndiaMART app ko install kar sakte hain sir. IndiaMART app mein install kar diya hoon. Magar wahi jo bylead mere ko aa raha hai na, unko aana chahiye. Main wahi bata raha hoon, mera aadmi hai. Unko bylead aise kya hai main isliye wo number add kiya tha. Ki unko agar bylead aa jayega to wo follow up kar sakte hain.
Executive: Sir, login primary number se hi hoga. Aap unko desktop pe ya app pe na, aap unko login de dijiye, access detail de dijiye. Kaise karenge wahi, product kaise karenge humko thoda ye karna chahiye. Main India unka mobile mere paas hai abhi.
Executive: Sir, wo phone marketing person hai ya matlab kin ko aap mera mera marketing person hai.
Executive: Aapke marketing person hai na. To aap aisa kar sakte hain sir, dekho do option hai sir aapke paas. Ya to unka number aap primary add kara de aur apna secondary rakhe. To login ho kar payenge. But agar aap aisa nahi chahte hain, aap unko apni detail access aap apne paas rakhna chahte hain sir, to fir aap aisa kar sakte hain, aap unko desktop pe ek bar jab jab wo login kare na sir, to wo aapka number dale.
Customer: Mera number. Haan, aapka number dale 94 wala. Usi se login kare aur wahin pe OTP aayega sir. Tabhi wo lead access kar payenge ya detail ko check kar payenge sir.
Executive: Samajh gaye na sir aap? Agar aap number change karna chahte hain to aap mujhe bataye sir main.
Customer: Nahi nahi change karna chahta. Main khali number nahi change karna chahta. Main wahi number jo add kiya hoon, third number jo mera hai, primary secondary jo third number, wo third number pe mere ko message aana chahiye, unko message nahi aa rahi.
Executive: Sir, third number pe sirf aapko buyer ki calls receive ho sakti hain. Jaise sir, aapka one number jo hai wo 94 wala that is your primary number. 82158 jisse abhi baat kar rahi hoon, it's a secondary number. And one one is third number added which is start from 9 90 and last digit yeah last digit 391, right? That that number is also added in services sir but but that number can be used for buyer calls only. So if you are busy if you are not able to pick the buyer call na, so your buyer call will be diverted on that number.
summary:
Concerns:

- Wants buyleads on the third added number.



Resolution:

- Explained primary number is needed for buyleads.

- Provided options to add marketing person's number.

- Explained third number is for receiving buyer calls.



Next Steps: 

- None



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, primary number, third number, login, app
